title: Who approved this at Riot?
body:

And I'm sorry, champs with that kind of kit should never be buffed into being meta, which she IS atm (unless you believe a champ with a 80% pick/ban in higher elo, and the second most pick/ban champ in tournament [http://gol.gg/champion/list/season-S8/split-Summer/tournament-ALL/patch-ALL/role-ALL/league-ALL/ ], is not considered meta for some reason).

Sivir's w enhances your next 3 basic attack to deal more damage and jump targets, what is far closer to Zoe's 3 enhanced basic attacks on her w that it is to Ahri's w which are just spheres that attack on their own.
Sivir's ult allows he to move faster towards a point, just like Ahri's while Zoe pops back to where she casted her ult.

In fact, if you want to compare Ahri {{champion:131}} is the champ to go.
He w is the excact same just with a shield.
Her q is also a skill shot, her ult are dashes, only that she needs to target something and her e also is a cc only that it's aoe

Zoe is really reliant on getting picks with her E and Q.
Ahri waits for the perfect moment to jump in with her ults and blast someone off the map.

they both play pretty drastically different.

Zoe and Ahri are not remotely similar. One is highly mobile and low burst damage, the other is low mobility and high burst damage.
